recipe.title: Lemon-Ginger Frozen Yogurt
ingredients: 2 teaspoons finely grated peeled fresh ginger
instructions: Bring water, sugar, light corn syrup, and grated ginger to boil in medium saucepan, stirring until sugar dissolves. Boil 2 minutes. Strain into medium bowl and chill until cool. Whisk in yogurt, buttermilk, lemon juice, and lemon peel. Process in ice cream maker according to manufacturer's instructions; cover and freeze.
